mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_profile (user_id, gold, material, blueprint, stamina, tower_floor, country) VALUES (#{userId}, #{gold}, #{material}, #{blueprint}, #{stamina}, #{towerFloor}, #{country})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_profile SET gold = gold - #{delta} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gold >= #{delta}
UPDATE user_profile SET material = material - #{delta} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND material >= #{delta}
